channel.title: Xampp
channel.description:
Is it a good idea to try and make it secure to use it as a production web server? I usually use Linux, and just host my sites with it. Being that it is very secure and uses little CPU. I'm kind of wanting to use a portable version, to take with me. But most places I 'hang my hat', uses Windows. Causing problems for me and hosting. But I have PortableApps, which has Xampp portable, so I was just wondering if it would be safe. I'm not looking for large amounts of traffic, just a very simple web server.
If you all have any better suggestion. I am open to them. I'm contemplating buying a WD Passport, instead of a Flash Drive. Allowing me to write without shortening the life of my drive.
EDIT: Holy Crap how'd I do that.. Posted in the wrong section. Move to Questions Please?

item.title: Xampp
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
